item.description:
Join us on October 4th, the night of the Full Harvest Moon. This full moon occurs closest to the Autumnal (fall) Equinox. Traditionally, the Harvest Moon usually comes in September, but sometimes it falls in early October, as is the case this year in 2009; the next October Harvest Moon won't come again until 2017.

During the time of the full moon, the ability to focus on intentions increases. This evening's meditation will build this power by featuring guided relaxation, breath awareness and visualizations for mental clarity. Combined with deep yoga stretches to circulate warmth and energy, a hot sauna will be available for clearing blockages within the body and internal organ systems. Purifying teas, juices and water will be available for cleansing and hydration.

Later in the evening, we will have a bonfire with hot cinnamon apple cider and drumming under the Full Harvest Moon.

$1 donation requested. Use of the sauna is optional for a $10 donation. All donations are to support the operations of the Growing Green Co-op's community center and healing arts space.
item.name: Full Moon Meditation, Yoga & Wellness Night
